name: places/ChIJRcmsWjRZwokRnZFSq5cE8AU
formattedAddress: 16 W 17th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 16 W 17th St, New York, NY 10011-5701, USA

originalText.text: This was my first visit and it was nothing but a positive experience! First, the interior design is lovely. Second, the front desk staff were welcoming and kind. Finally, I loved my Nurse Practitioner, Janna. She explained everything so well and made me feel completely comfortable and confident. She did a wonderful job!! Because I was nervous, she just injected a small amount and I came back 2 weeks later for touch ups. I really appreciated this, because it made me much more comfortable for my first time. And she kindly gave me advise on what to order for my next visit. The after treatment serum is amazing! I will be returning!

originalText.text: I come here for Botox treatments, and have always had a good experience. My appointment today with Sai was exceptional. He is so professional, thorough and caring. He listened to my concerns, made very sensible recommendations and was very gentle with the needles. I felt very comfortable in his presence, which is so important! Ryan at the front counter was particularly kind to me as well! Thank you all! Highly recommend! :)

He listened to my concerns, made very sensible recommendations and was very gentle with the needles. I felt very comfortable in his presence, which is so important! Ryan at the front counter was particularly kind to me as well! Thank you all! Highly recommend! :)

originalText.text: Came here recently for jaw Botox, and the results exceeded my expectations! Shout out to my nurse practitioner, Janna. The entire process was smooth, and I'm impressed by her attention to detail. Can’t wait to come back!

text.text: Came here recently for jaw Botox, and the results exceeded my expectations! Shout out to my nurse practitioner, Janna. The entire process was smooth, and I'm impressed by her attention to detail. Can’t wait to come back!

originalText.text:
Been to some very expensive Dermatologists in NYC. EverBody is just as effective and at least 1/2 the price.  I’ve gone to EverBody for about a year and have not been disappointed.

They stand by their work. There is never a discussion about maximum units they use. The amount is based on your results. I was very hesitant to do filler with them as it’s more obvious if there’s an issue.  But I have to shout out Saif at the Flatiron location. He is my favorite. He was patient listened to my concerns and actually told me that he wouldn’t recommend what I was interested in as it was very minimal and not as pronounced as I thought.

He agreed that my chin could use some boosting and did an AMAZING job. I’m really very satisfied.

My only caution is not all injectors are equal. While I haven’t had any negative results or issues some have been less effective and in one case slightly painful.

My advice is take it slow and build up confidence with someone. Everyone has a different understanding of what looks good. You need to align yourself with someone that shares your aesthetic.

originalText.text: I’ve been coming to ever/body for Botox for about two years now and they’ve always done an amazing job. The “after” pic attached is from just 3 days after my first treatment with them, so it doesn’t even show the full results — such a huge improvement that only got better with time. I see Stephanie R and she is always extremely attentive and listens to my concerns / desired results. Plus, they offer free touchups for two weeks after your service which is great if you’re nervous like I was. It’s also half as expensive as my dermatologist which is a huge plus LOL. I haven’t gotten any other services yet but I’m considering a few and feel that the staff is really trustworthy. Highly recommend for injectables!
